desc: Dry Eye Drink was designed by an Optometrist and Ophthalmologist that specialize in Dry Eye who found that most of their patients were dehydrated. Simply add one stick to water and shake vigorously. Drink 1 to 2 Dry Eye Drinks each day to hyperhydrate! Currently Orange & Mixed Berries flavors are available.

layout.text: CREATED BY DOCTORS WHO SPECIALIZE IN DRY EYE.
